titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for prohibiting the transportation of horns unwrought, and bunns of horns unwrought
Proclamations. 1668-12-18.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)

publicationStmt.publisher: In the Savoy, printed by the assigns of John Bill and Christopher Barker, printers to the Kings most Excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Whitehall the eighteenth day of December, in the twentieth year of our reign. 1668.".
Concerns privileges of the Horners' Company.
Arms 75; Steele notation: prevent Reign, 2) And of.
Reproduction of the original in the Guildhall Library, London.
